name: Chucklefish
info:
• 别名: 呵呵鱼工作室
  • 别名: Chucklefish Games / Chucklefish Limited
  • 引用来源: http://chucklefish.org/
detail: Chucklefish Games, also known as Chucklefish Limited or simply Chucklefish, is an independent video game developer and publisher based in London, United Kingdom. The company specializes in role-playing games, and are best known for their titles Starbound and Risk of Rain.
